meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath the cerebral cortex.
meanings.sent1: The subcortical structures play a vital role in brain function.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the subcortical areas to understand brain development.
meanings.sent3: The subcortical regions whispered secrets to the cortex.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled in a subcortical dance, hidden from view.
meanings.sent5: The subcortical depths held mysteries waiting to be uncovered.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the regions of the brain beneath the cortex.
meanings.sent1: Researchers explore the subcortical pathways for new discoveries.
meanings.sent2: The subcortical structures regulate essential bodily functions.
meanings.sent3: The subcortical neurons threw a party while the cortex was asleep.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a subcortical labyrinth, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The subcortical realm was a hidden treasure trove of neurological wonders.
